Cap it all off in style with trips to local restaurants, and the chance to kick back with your Contiki crew at our luxury Haus Schöneck - a Special Stay worthy of the name with an on-site bar and cosy lounge area. Tour Operator: Contiki Pricing Start Date End Date Price (Quad) 29 May 26 1 Jun 26 $715 Enquire 11 Jun 26 14 Jun 26 $715 Enquire 25 Jun 26 28 Jun 26 $715 Enquire 9 Jul 26 12 Jul 26 $715 Enquire 16 Jul 26 19 Jul 26 $715 Enquire 23 Jul 26 26 Jul 26 $715 Enquire 30 Jul 26 2 Aug 26 $715 Enquire 6 Aug 26 9 Aug 26 $715 Enquire 13 Aug 26 16 Aug 26 $715 Enquire 20 Aug 26 23 Aug 26 $715 Enquire 28 Aug 26 31 Aug 26 $715 Enquire 10 Sep 26 13 Sep 26 $715 Enquire 17 Sep 26 20 Sep 26 $715 Enquire Please note: while prices are accurate at time of loading they are subject to change due to currency fluctuations and currency surcharges may apply.Please check price at time of booking Itinerary Day 1 - Hopfgarten im Brixental Hello there and welcome to the Alps! We’ll pick you up at Worgl Train Station (included transfer, baby!) and once we’ve all set down our bags at Contiki Haus Schöneck, we’ll kick off the trip officially with a welcome meeting conducted by your Trip Manager. After that, we’ll tuck into an included dinner – made fresh on-site with local ingredients. After dinner, we'll head off for a gentle sunset hike to mark the start of our adventure. Day 2 - Hopfgarten im Brixental After conquering the village trails, it's time to explore Hopfgarten and beyond in a different way; this time on 2 wheels. Join us for a locally guided bike tour through the vibrant green trails, before cruising downhill for a well-earned BBQ lunch. Fancy one last adrenaline hit? You can opt for some tandem paragliding today, soaring over the alps for some peerless panoramas. The adventure has just begun! Day 3 - Hopfgarten im Brixental (Including Haiming & Innsbruck) We’ll start early this morning as we treat ourselves to more of the alps. Next stop? Haiming…Here in Haiming, you can choose to do whatever you like. But we reckon you’d wanna experience some heart-pounding action with white water rafting followed by included picnic lunch.Next up, we’ll make our way to Innsbruck, where you’ll have some free time to explore the city and grab a bite to eat.Back in Haus Schöneck, you’ll have plenty of things to dream about tonight… Day 4 - Hopfgarten im Brixental Whether you take our complimentary transfer to Worgl or make your own way to your next destination, it's time to say goodbye to your new friends and Hopfgarten (which feels like a home away from home now, right?) Don't worry though, once you've swapped contact deets with your new Contiki crew, there's bound to be a new adventure on the horizon soon. Tour deposit, amendment and cancellation conditions may apply. Food fund and airfares may be additional. Travel agent service fees may apply. Special conditions apply - please ask for full details at time of enquiry.
